    • main

      @GetMapping("/") public String main(Book book, org.springframework.ui.Model model, @ModelAttribute("SearchName") SearchName searchName)
      The main function of the landing page.
      Parameters:
      book - - a book we will display in the shop.
      model - - the model that allows us to add attribute.
      searchName - - the search bar that allows us to search books.
      Returns:
      - the index page.

    • adminIndex

      @RequestMapping("/admin") public String adminIndex(Book book, Principal principal, org.springframework.ui.Model model, PaymentTracker payments)
      This function return the page of the admin page.
      Parameters:
      book - - an object for the html.
      principal - - an allowed principle. Someone who didn't fill the information can't reach here/
      model - - the model that allows us to add attribute.
      payments - - the payments object for the html.
      Returns:
      - the admin/index page.

      A function that u[dates book in the list.
      Parameters:
      id - - the id of the book we want to update.
      book - - book object for the html.
      result - - a result for the html.
      model - - the model that allows us to add attribute.
      Returns:
      - admin/index page if succeeded or admin/update-book if some info was wrong.

    • payForBooks

      @GetMapping("/payment") public String payForBooks(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @ModelAttribute("SearchName") SearchName searchName)
      The payment function that allows the user to pay.
      Parameters:
      model - - the model that allows us to add attribute.
      searchName - - an object that allows the user to search books in the shop.
      Returns:
      - if succeeded a payment page, or no-books page.
